title: The lack of Zyra love from RIOT is disappointing
body:
The devs seem to wish she didn't exist, she's had a bug with her plants spawning and sometimes not focusing ANYTHING at all, they just spawn and do nothing -- in which this issue has been reported to Med, and he said he would take care of it.... over 3 months ago. And has just ignored it.
She has old textures on a her skins, minus her last skin a year or so ago that was a monochromatic mess. There just seems to be no love for her from the game developers or art team.

replies.body: The plants AI bug is confirmed to be fixed for the next patch.

Now they can get back to ignoring the rest of her bugs.

> [{quoted}](name=Vekkna,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XrxOZ8kF,comment-id=0001000000000002,timestamp=2018-09-26T21:27:38.541+0000)
> 
> * Plants pulling minion aggro sometimes. **Since shortly after 8.2**
> 
> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/QLTLM3cs-zyra-plants-triggers-minions-agro
> 
> * Plants dying in 1 hit to some ranged attacks (Corki, MF, Siphon Power discharge) but not other similar attacks (eg Tumble, Energized). Plants dying in 1 hit to aoe melee attacks (Yasuo Q). Plants taking damage as "aoe" rather than "DoT" with some spells (eg Corki E). **Since 7.24**
> 
> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/J8lRnYE7-zyra-plant-interaction-bugs
> 
> * Ult tooltip says enraged plants deal 200% damage. In-game enraged plants only deal 150% damage. **Since 7.20.**
> 
> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/tyWcLx0b-zyra-stranglethorn-plant-buff-not-matching-tooltip
> 
> * Plant attacks not counting as "ability" for purposes of manaflow band. **Since 8.7.**
> 
> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/e4tTuw16-gameplay-zyra-manaflow-band-and-plant-interaction-bug
>
> * Plant attacks treated as "basic attacks" by Tabi, Counterstrike, and Spiked Shell (also 1-shotting them)
Good I hope they remove her.
They fix the bug that the plants attack wrong targets like dead bodys. But they don´t  fix the bug that they don´t attack anything at all.

Riot said that it´s  too much (art) work for them because of their plants. 

Only few players and more work = not enough revenue
